text: The 2021 international cricket season is scheduled to take place from April 2021 to September 2021. Currently, 18 One Day Internationals (ODIs) and the final of the 2019–21 ICC World Test Championship are scheduled to be held in this season. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable ubsortable" style="text- align:center; white-space:nowrap" ! colspan=6 | International tours |- ! rowspan=2 | Start date ! rowspan=2 | Home team ! rowspan=2 | Away team ! colspan=3 | Results [Matches] |- ! width=100 | Test ! width=100 | ODI ! width=100 | T20I |- ! colspan=6 |International tournaments |- !
